name: Mudpocalypse
description:
Taking on the theme "Mud season" on the northern east coast (part of the Maine game jam) this unique take on a base defense has you fighting to keep the snow on the ground as long as possible.

You can only place buildings on patches of snow (not mud) and enemies will leave mud behind anywhere they move. Control resources and a handful of soldiers to protect your base.

q,e - wasd to move camera

left click to select units, buy buildings, select defensive buildings to adjust how many people are stationed in them to increase attack speed
